{"id":890534297,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1675406696,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/890534297/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"42.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int row;\n    int gap;\n\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n\n        row = numRows;\n        int gap = (row-1) * 2;\n\n        if(gap <= 0) return s;\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n\n        for(int i=0; i < numRows; i++){\n            if(i < s.length())\n                sb.append(s.charAt(i));\n\n            int j = i + gap;\n            while(j - i - i < s.length()){                \n                if( i != 0 && i != numRows-1)                    \n                    sb.append(s.charAt(j-i-i));\n                \n                if(j < s.length())\n                    sb.append(s.charAt(j));\n\n                j += gap;\n            }\n\n        }\n\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false}
